headline: Alignment Health Appoints Adnan Mansour as Chief Digital Officer to Accelerate AI-Driven Growth and Technology Leadership
summary: Industry veteran brings decades of experience in artificial intelligence, digital transformation and large-scale technology operations to support Alignment’s next phase of growthORANGE, Calif., Jan. 20, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Alignment Health, an award-winning Medicare Advantage (MA) company, today announced the appointment of Adnan Mansour as chief digital officer, an executive leadership role that unifies the company’s technology and information functions to drive scalable growth and continu
